name: JUKE (itch)
description:
Hi, welcome to JUKE, a little puzzle game about rotations and other nonsenses made for the Ludum Dare 36

Use the arrows to move around.(if the character stops moving, move a little bit left or right to get on the middle on the path)

I hope you'll like it!

If you feel nauseous because of the camera or other graphical elements in the game, consider downloading the alternate builds.
